Html:
Hello,

we are using the Typescript 0.9.1.1 plugin with VS2013 and we are experiencing that VS hangs from time to time when developing with Typescript (a dialog pop up that VS is waiting for an internal operation to complete).
This does not happen when developing C++ applications, so we think that it is related to the TypeScript plugin.
Does anyone else experiencing the same problems? Any tips how to avoid it.
Since it is not very easy to reproduce, I didn't not dare entering a issue in the issue tracker, but I'll be happy to provide you all the needed details (Logfiles, memory dumps, etc.) if requested.

Regards,
Samuel

We've been doing a bunch of work trying to fix memory leaks, crashers, and related stability problems with 0.9.5, our next release.

There's a beta available that it might be useful to try out to see if those issues disappear for you:

https://typescript.codeplex.com/wikipage?title=TypeScript%200.9.5%20beta

If you try out the beta and are still seeing issues like that, please let us know so we can track them down.
